title: My account was suspended because I refunded RP is would this be considered chargeback?
body: Hello, About a year ago my account was suspended due to me wanting a refund on RP. I can't remember the exact details and why. But I would like to know if it falls under chargeback and if I can get my account unsuspended. I've submitted support tickets and I'll keep waiting on them. I just want to know if my account can be unsuspended and how. I would love to pay back the money I refunded but I'm currently broke and a college student. Anyways Thanks for Reading have a wonderful day.

replies.body:
Since we'll need to take a look at your account to address this and you've already submitted a ticket, I recommend waiting for an account specialist to get back to you in your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I actually figured out it is considered chargeback through a Riot employee on Reddit ty anyways
